import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { FormControl, FormGroup, Validators } from '@angular/forms'; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.css'] }) export class AppComponent implements OnInit { form: FormGroup title = 'SofTrust.UI'; ngOnInit() { this.form = new FormGroup({ email: new FormControl('', Validators.email), password: new FormControl(null) }); } submit(){ console.log('Form', this.form) const formData = {...this.form.value} console.log('Form Data:', formData) } }

Angular Forms
